com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling

Class InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling.JournalingPersistentStoreBase
      • com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling.InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteArrayStore, IVersionedSizedStore, IPersistentByteArrayStore, IJournalingStoreAccessor, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedJournalingPersistentStore, MappedJournalingPersistentStore

    public abstract class InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStore
extends JournalingPersistentStoreBase
    Base class for journal implementations that rely on in-memory indexing and therefore require to fully scan the journal at load time.

    • Method Detail

      • clearIndex

        protected abstract void clearIndex()
        Clears the store's in-memory index.

      • scanJournal

        protected void scanJournal()
                    throws FileCorruptedException
        Scans the journal in order to rebuild the version history offset series, to index write requests and to prime the store's version and size. Fully scans the journal.
        Overrides:
        scanJournal in class JournalingPersistentStoreBase
        Throws:
        FileCorruptedException - if the journal appears to be corrupted
